name: Pirkei Avos
author: Benny Powers

sections.description:
The plugin quotes at random from Pirkei Avos.

For internet heteirim and other accoutrements, please consult your local orthodox rabbi.

P.S. Email for shabbes accommodations in Jerusalem.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Consult with the relevant halachic authorities
  2. Upload avos.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Only after you’ve been tested with the chance to install this plugin again, and do install it, will you know that you’ve done a complete installation.
sections.faq:
Do I need to stop eating pork once I install this plugin?

Absolutely.

What about Chinese food?

I’m sure it won’t be too hard to find kosher Chinese food

Should I buy a Chrysler

Can you rephrase that as an ethical question?
